articles.author: Megan Lebowitz
articles.title: Trump says the U.S. took out a 'big facility' in Venezuela amid strikes on alleged drug boats - NBC News
articles.description: President Donald Trump said in an interview with WABC radio in New York that the U.S. “knocked out” a Venezuelan facility, a move that would mark a major escalation in U.S. military strikes to counter alleged drug-trafficking by the South American country.
articles.content: WASHINGTON President Donald Trump said in an interview with WABC radio in New York that the U.S. had knocked out a Venezuelan facility, a move that would be a major escalation in U.S. military strike… [+3162 chars]
